title: My wish: A call for open-source architecture
description: Accepting his 2006 TED Prize, Cameron Sinclair demonstrates how passionate designers and architects can respond to world housing crises. He unveils his TED Prize wish for a network to improve global living standards through collaborative design.
author: Cameron Sinclair
keywords: TED, talks, activism, architecture, collaboration, culture, design, disaster relief, global issues, invention, open-source, philanthropy
